data.route_analysis: Guatemala is accessible via La Aurora International Airport, with options for domestic flights to popular cities like Antigua and Flores. Public transportation is available but renting a car or taking shuttles is recommended for flexibility.
data.pricing_trends: Average daily costs range from $30 to $80 depending on accommodation and activities. Prices may rise in peak travel seasons.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best months to visit Guatemala are from November to April, avoiding the rainy season from May to October.
data.booking_windows: Travelers should book at least 2-3 months in advance for the best deals, especially during holidays and festivals.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Guatemala is accessible via La Aurora International Airport, with options for domestic flights to popular cities like Antigua and Flores. Public transportation is available but renting a car or taking shuttles is recommended for flexibility.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Best months to visit Guatemala are from November to April, avoiding the rainy season from May to October.
destination_insights.climate: Temperatures in Guatemala are generally mild due to altitude; average temperatures range from 60째F (15째C) to 75째F (24째C) during the fall. Visitors should prepare for occasional rain, especially in higher altitudes.
destination_insights.culture: Guatemala features rich Maya heritage, colorful markets, and various festivals such as the Day of the Dead celebrations in early November.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Average daily costs range from $30 to $80 depending on accommodation and activities. Prices may rise in peak travel seasons.
market_insights.booking_windows: Travelers should book at least 2-3 months in advance for the best deals, especially during holidays and festivals.
market_insights.demand: Increasing interest in eco-tourism and cultural experiences has led to higher visits during the winter months.
market_insights.competition: Alternative destinations include Costa Rica and Belize, but Guatemala offers unique cultural and historical experiences.

trend_insights.market_trends: Eco-tourism is on the rise, with more travelers focusing on sustainable experiences in rural areas.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly utilizing online resources and travel apps to plan their trips.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Competitors include Central American countries focusing on eco-friendly tourism and luxury vacations.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Seasonal shifts affect the number of visitors, with peaks during holidays and lower numbers during the rainy season.
